titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of in the Diocesse of Norwich in the first visitation of the Right Reverend Father in God, Edward, Lord Bishop of Norwich.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Norwich. Bishop (1661-1676 : Reynolds)
Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

notesStmt.note: Fourth title in a filmed collection of visitation articles.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library and the Union Theological Seminary.
